{{Infobox Pokéball |name = Duskball |image = [[File:Duskball.png]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Duskball''. |price = Variable |catchTime = 1s |catchRate = Variable (Depending on Time and Location) *+15% during night (6PM - 6AM) and in [[Dungeons]] *+0% during day (6AM - 6PM) and in all other locations |location =
*[[Towns & Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]] }} ==Description== The '''Timerball''' is a type of [[Pokéballs|Pokéball]]. It automatically tries to catch a wild Pokémon after defeating it if is the highest type of Pokéball active and there is a remaining supply in the Pokéball selector. ==Details== A specialized Pokéball to capture Pokémon with, it provides an increased catch rate on routes with more Pokémon defeated and catches Pokémon in 1s. ===Rates=== {| class="wikitable" |+ Timerball |- ! Location !! Catch Chance Modifier |- | Night (6AM - 6PM) and in [[Dungeons]] || +15% |- | Day (6PM - 6AM) and in all other locations || +0% (Equal to Pokéball) |- |} ==Acquisition== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Pokéballs}} {{ItemPrice|[[Berry Master#Trades|Goldenrod City]]|20 - 40 Random [[File:Cheri.png|25px]] [[Berries#Gen 1 Berries|Gen 1 Berries]]
5 - 15 Random [[File:Persim.png|25px]] [[Berries#Gen 2 Berries|Gen 2 Berries]]}} |} |}
